# Django Filter Sort

## Settings

* __DJANGO_FILTER_SORT_PAGE_RANGE__ Set the max range show for the paginator, default 10
* __DJANGO_FILTER_SORT_PAGINATE_BY__ Set the number of element for the paginator, default None
* __DJANGO_FILTER_SORT_PAGE_KWARG__ Set the default kwarg for pages, default page
* __DJANGO_FILTER_SORT_SORT_KWARG__ Set the default kwarg for sort, default sort
